column1: A remembrance service to honor the life of Mr. Green will be held at 11 A.M. Friday
column3: in the Macclenny Primitive Baptist Church with Elder David Crawford
column5: officiating and assisted by Elder Michael Green
column6: Pastor of the Fort Wayne Primitive Baptist
column8: Indiana.  Interment will be in South Prong Cemetery
column10: Florida.  Visitation and gathering with the family will be from 6 to 8 P.M. Thursday

column15: Florida is in charge of arrangements
